CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 9, 1952, pg. 28, reads: "Children Spark Fund Drive - More than $6,00 was reported by the workers of Ethnan Temple Seventh Day Adventist Church, Pittsburgh. This group of children, whose ages are between 6 and 13 yeats, sparked the drive.  Front row, left to right, Ramadon Abdul Azeez, L. Bradford, M. Riley, C. Bradford, L. Bradford.  Back row: Elder Dasent, Mrs. L. Davis, principal of the school; Mrs. C. Jones, teacher, Mrs. F. Patterson and Mrs. M. Jackson, leader of the Home, School and Church Missionary Society, who sponsored a trip to Niagara Falls for the children.  Not in picture: C. Monroe, W. Thomas and T. Murphy.  Lillian Bradford, 6, raised $24. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of members of Ethnan Temple Seventh Day Adventist Church, front row from left: Ramadon Abdul Azeez, L. Bradford, M. Riley, C. Bradford, L. Bradford; back row: Elder Dasent, Mrs. L. Davis, Mrs. C. Jones, Mrs. F. Patterson, and Mrs. M. Jackson
